snippet: Despite a sore right hamstring, Derrick Rose wove through the Pacers’ defense to score 20 points.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls defeat Indiana Pacers, 110-94, to hand Indiana its first loss of the season; other basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: Despite a sore right hamstring, Derrick Rose wove through the Pacers’ defense to score 20 points.

headline.main: Bulls Slice Through Pacers and Deliver First Defeat
headline.print_headline:
Bulls Slice Through Pacers
And Deliver First Defeat
